terms_accept_message: Please accept the Terms of Service to continue
signup_success: Account created. You're now signed in.
empty_ticket_description: Add selections from the optimizer or ticket creator
generate_optimized_betting_tickets: Sign in to generate optimized betting tickets
who_concedes_subtitle: Teams ranked by average goals conceded or scored (last 10 matches, all competitions)
who_concedes_footer_concedes: Teams at the top concede the most goals • Based on last 10 matches across all competitions
who_concedes_footer_scores: Teams at the top score the most goals • Based on last 10 matches across all competitions
who_concedes_empty: Select a league and click "Show Ranking" to see which teams concede or score the most goals.
who_concedes_no_data_desc: No historical data found for this league
build_ticket_description: Build your betting ticket from selections across the app
add_selections_prompt: Add selections from anywhere using the ticket + button
odds_updated_description: All odds have been updated to the latest values.
refresh_failed_description: Could not refresh odds. Please try again.
ticket_cleared_description: All selections removed from your ticket.
odds_range_note: All odds are within the qualified range [1.25-5.00]. Odds refresh automatically when you open this drawer.
reset_password_description: Enter the email you used to register and we'll send you a password reset link.
reset_email_sent_description: If an account exists for this email, a reset link has been sent.
reset_email_failed_description: Unable to send reset email. Please check the address and try again.
reset_link_invalid: Reset link is invalid or has expired
reset_link_invalid_description: Reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.
card_war_description: Find the most aggressive teams by cards and fouls in each league.
card_war_no_data_desc: There is not enough card/foul data for this league yet. Try another one.
card_war_footer_cards: Teams at the top receive the most cards • Based on last {{count}} matches
card_war_footer_fouls: Teams at the top commit the most fouls • Based on last {{count}} matches
card_war_empty: Select a league and click "Show ranking" to see which teams get the most cards and fouls.
